Package net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest

Class AbstractFileDigester

java.lang.Object
net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest.AbstractFileDigester
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileDigester
Direct Known Subclasses:
CksumFileDigester, CRC32FileDigester, MessageDigestFileDigester
public abstract class AbstractFileDigester
extends Object
implements FileDigester
Base class for implementations of FileDigester.

1.0

Julien Nicoulaud
